channel.title: What program i need to compile
channel.description: plz help me i dont know wt file i need to use to compile coz it wnt leme if u can tell me tht would b grate. i only no tht i need java.jdk but dnt no which 1 thnx again plz hlp

item.title: What program i need to compile
item.dc:creator: @Puremaster Puremaster
item.description:
@Puremaster wrote:

You need [command propt]
that is the program with black board that will run stuff like this for you.

this is the codes if you need it :rolleyes:

this is the code for compiler if u have jdk 6.1
it works like this
example remember the example code is for server running bat

@echo off COLOR 09 title you're server name "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\javac" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\java" server pause
that jdk 5.7 if you have jdk 6.1
then u change it like this

@echo off COLOR 09 title PhoneScape Source "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\javac" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\java" server pause
and if u have jdk 6.2 then u change the 1 to 2 if you have 6.3 u change 1 to 3
if you have jdk 7.4 example its not even out lol then u change 6 to 7 and 1 to 4
and its same with compiler type ctrl then f type “C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\javac” -cp . *.java
then change it thats all you need to do it works 100% i do that all the time

Read full topic
